cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

set(emulator-libjpeg_src)
android_add_library(
  TARGET emulator-libjpeg
  LIBNAME
    libjpeg
    URL
    "https://android.googlesource.com/platform/external/qemu/+/refs/heads/emu-master-dev/android/third_party/jpeg-6b/"
  REPO "${ANDROID_QEMU2_TOP_DIR}/android/third_party/jpeg-6b/"
  NOTICE "REPO/NOTICE"
  LICENSE IJG
  SRC # cmake-format: sortable
      jcapimin.c
      jcapistd.c
      jccoefct.c
      jccolor.c
      jcdctmgr.c
      jchuff.c
      jcinit.c
      jcmainct.c
      jcmarker.c
      jcmaster.c
      jcomapi.c
      jcparam.c
      jcphuff.c
      jcprepct.c
      jcsample.c
      jctrans.c
      jdapimin.c
      jdapistd.c
      jdatadst.c
      jdatasrc.c
      jdcoefct.c
      jdcolor.c
      jddctmgr.c
      jdhuff.c
      jdinput.c
      jdmainct.c
      jdmarker.c
      jdmaster.c
      jdmerge.c
      jdphuff.c
      jdpostct.c
      jdsample.c
      jdtrans.c
      jerror.c
      jfdctflt.c
      jfdctfst.c
      jfdctint.c
      jidctflt.c
      jidctfst.c
      jidctint.c
      jidctintelsse.c
      jidctred.c
      jmem-android.c
      jmemmgr.c
      jquant1.c
      jquant2.c
      jutils.c)
target_include_directories(emulator-libjpeg PUBLIC .)
if (HOST_DARWIN_AARCH64 AND DARWIN_X86_64)
  message(WARNING "Cross compiling from M1 -> X86, disabling optimizations for libjpeg. Do not release this!")
endif()
if(NOT BUILDING_FOR_AARCH64 AND NOT (HOST_DARWIN_AARCH64 AND DARWIN_X86_64))
  target_compile_options(emulator-libjpeg PRIVATE -O3 -fstrict-aliasing -msse2
                                                  -Wno-all)
  target_compile_definitions(
    emulator-libjpeg PRIVATE -DAVOID_TABLES -DANDROID_INTELSSE2_IDCT
                             -DANDROID_TILE_BASED_DECODE)
else()
  target_compile_options(emulator-libjpeg PRIVATE -O3 -fstrict-aliasing
                                                  -Wno-all)
  target_compile_definitions(emulator-libjpeg
                             PRIVATE -DAVOID_TABLES -DANDROID_TILE_BASED_DECODE)
endif()
target_link_libraries(emulator-libjpeg PRIVATE android-emu-base)
